name: @saekitominaga/htmltablecellelement-ditto
description: Display the data cell with the same content as the cell directly above in <tbody> with a ditto mark.
author: Saeki Tominaga

scripts._build:compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.js -- brotlin compress dist/TableCellDitto.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.js -- terser dist/TableCellDitto.js -o dist/TableCellDitto.min.js -c ecma=2020 --mangle --ecma 2020 --module --source-map content='dist/TableCellDitto.js.map',filename='TableCellDitto.js',includeSources,url='TableCellDitto.min.js.map'
scripts._build:minify-compress: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.min.js -- brotlin compress dist/TableCellDitto.min.js -m 1
scripts._build:minify-declaration: onchange -f add -f change -v dist/TableCellDitto.d.ts -- cpy dist/TableCellDitto.d.ts dist --rename=TableCellDitto.min.d.ts
